overview: Sixty men fill three rings for one gigantic Battle Royal for the vacant WCW World Heavyweight Championship. Participants include Lex Luger, "Diamond" Dallas Page, "The Macho Man" Randy Savage and many more. Plus, Sting battles Ric Flair and much more action!
tagline: Sixty Men... Three Rings... Three Giants... One Battle Royal.
title: WCW World War 3 1995
